name: Basic Effect Qualities
description: Basic attack effect qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: FEAR
qualities.description:
Apply the **[FEAR]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **ACC** is reduced by the Caster's **DOS** on **Attacks** against the Caster for the duration. The Target also cannot **Clash** with the Caster.

If the Target is afflicted by multiple uses of **[FEAR]**, it will only be affected by the most recent Caster.

qualities.name: ROOT
qualities.description: Apply the **[ROOT]** Tag to one **Attack**. When the Target willingly moves towards the Caster, the full distance it can **Move** is reduced by 1. The Target cannot initiate or control a **Clash** against the Caster.

qualities.name: SLOW
qualities.description: Apply the **[SLOW]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **Movement** is reduced by the Caster's **BIT** for the duration, to a minimum of 0.

qualities.name: TAUNT
qualities.description:
Apply the **[TAUNT]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **ACC** is reduced by the Caster's **CPU** on **Attacks** against anyone but the Caster for the duration.

If the Target is afflicted by multiple uses of **[TAUNT]**, it will only be affected by the most recent Caster. If the Attacker uses an **Area Attack** which has the Caster as a Target, the **ACC** is reduced by half the Caster's **CPU** instead.

When the Target willingly moves away from the Caster, the full distance it can **Move** is reduced by 1.

qualities.name: PULL
qualities.description: Apply the **[PULL]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target is moved towards the Caster an amount of **Spaces** equal to the Caster's **DOS** + **Stage**.

qualities.name: PUSH
qualities.description: Apply the **[PUSH]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target is moved away from the Caster an amount of **Spaces** equal to the Caster's **CPU** + **Stage**.

qualities.name: SWIFT
qualities.description: Apply the **[SWIFT]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **DOD** is increased by the Caster's **RAM** for the duration.

qualities.name: KEEN
qualities.description: Apply the **[KEEN]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **ACC** is increased by the Caster's **BIT** for the duration.

qualities.name: TAILWIND
qualities.description: Apply the **[TAILWIND]** Tag to one **Attack**. The Target's **Movement** is increased by the Caster's **RAM** for the duration.
